name: Health Benefits Direct
overview: Health Benefits Direct Corporation engages in the direct marketing and distribution of health and life insurance products. It acts as an independent agent, selling health and life insurance, and related products on behalf of various insurance carriers. The company sells major medical health insurance for individuals and families, as well as short-term medical policies, health savings accounts, and term life insurance through its non employee Insurance Specialist Group, Inc. agents. Health Benefits Direct Corporation also offers Insurint, a Web-based tool that provides insurance agents and brokers with a quoting engine and on-demand customer relationship management platform to streamline their sales and marketing activities. In addition, it provides InsPro, an insurance administration and marketing system that supports group and individual business lines, and processes agent, direct market, worksite, and Web site generated business; and sells software licenses, as well as offers application, software maintenance, consulting, and implementation services. The company sells its InsPro software directly to insurance carriers and third party administrators. Health Benefits Direct Corporation was founded in 2004 and is based in Radnor, Pennsylvania.

funding_rounds.source_description: Health Benefits Direct Announces Agreement to Raise $5.4 Million in Private Placement
